data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Florida, Uruguay a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Florida, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Florida, Uruguay to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Florida, Uruguay to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 4,895 believers in Florida to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sarandí Grande
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sarandí Grande, Florida, Uruguay.
Father, please give the people in the state of Florida access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, may the churches in Florida, Uruguay honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the state of Florida, Uruguay has a population of 67,100.

We estimate Florida has 4,895 people who might know Jesus, 39,744 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22,461 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Florida, Uruguay.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
